Plot: An accountant is chased by bounty hunters, the FBI, and the Mafia after jumping bail.
Title: Midnight Run
Actors: Robert De Niro, Charles Grodin, Yaphet Kotto, John Ashton
tomatoConsensus: Enlivened by the antagonistic chemistry between Robert De Niro and Charles Grodin, Midnight Run is an uncommonly entertaining odd couple comedy.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 2 wins & 1 nomination.
